snippet.title: Umineko No Naku Koro Ni Saku - PS4/Nintendo Switch Opening (Platinum Empireo)
snippet.description:
Credits:

Entergram/07th Expansion
Opening Theme: Silver Empyrean
Lyrics: Kanae Sakura/Luck Ganriki
Composition: dai/xaki/Luck Ganriki
Vocals: Zakuro Motoki

Opening movie of Umineko no Naku Koro ni Saku ~Nekobako to Musou no Koukyoukyoku~ (PS4/Switch). Song title: "Platinum Empireo" (白金のエンピレオ)

Game website: http://entergram.co.jp/umineko/
Release date: January 28th, 2021 (Japan)
